item.value: This is an automated online sales report for ' & CLIP(P:CurrentLabel) '.<13,10>The attached file contains a fully itemised list of the latest month''s digital sales revenue ' & | 'and the total amount now owed to you by '& CLIP(L:ProcessCompany) & | '<13,10>Please send us an invoice at your earliest convenience. Please note: ' & | '<13,10>If you are a self billing customer, you do not need to send us an invoice.' & | '<13,10>The total amount is: (GBP) ' & ROUND(P:IodaTotal, .01) & | !using the ioda total to display the individual '<13,10><13,10>Our standard minimum amount for payment is Â£200 but this amount can also ' & | !label total 'be inclusive of any outstanding combined physical sales amount due.'&| '<13,10>You must however differentiate digital sales revenue from physical sales revenue on any invoices posted.' & | '<13,10><13,10>Regards,<13,10>' & CLIP(L:ProcessCompany) </style>
